summary.purpose: Provides four coloured scooter SVG icon generator functions (red, yellow, green, gray) conforming to the VehicleSvg signature for use as map markers and menu icons.
summary.problem_solved: Supplies the scooter vehicle type's state-specific icon variants so map and menu components can reflect real-time ignition and speed state visually.

internal.why_used: Imports the VehicleSvg function type used to type the exported icon functions.

exports.name: redScooterIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a red scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: yellowScooterIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a yellow scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: greenScooterIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a green scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: grayScooterIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a gray scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

symbols.name: redScooterIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a red scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Red scooter icon SVG element. Red indicates ignition is off.

details.what_it_does: Generates a scooter SVG icon in red, indicating ignition is off.

minimal_correct.title: Render a red scooter icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { redScooterIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = redScooterIcon('30', '30', '#FF0000', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: yellowScooterIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a yellow scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Yellow scooter icon SVG element. Yellow indicates idling.

details.what_it_does: Generates a scooter SVG icon in yellow, indicating idle state.

minimal_correct.title: Render a yellow scooter icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { yellowScooterIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = yellowScooterIcon('30', '30', '#FFFF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: greenScooterIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a green scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Green scooter icon SVG element. Green indicates actively moving.

details.what_it_does: Generates a scooter SVG icon in green, indicating the scooter is actively moving.

minimal_correct.code:

symbols.name: grayScooterIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a gray scooter SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.
